tvdb: After receiving Lucy's party invitation, an angry Eve confronts Lucy about sleeping with Ian.  Lucy apologizes but tells Eve to own up to her responsibility for her marriage troubles.  Rafe and Alison visit Ian and give him a special ornament which gives him the Christmas spirit.  While babysitting, Rafe impresses both baby Daniel and Ali with his magic.  Eve comes home to find Ian has decorated their loft for Christmas.  Rafe almost kisses Ali, but stops and runs off.  Kevin visits with a mystery woman and says he won't tell Lucy.  Kevin then follows the woman into her bedroom where she has promised him a surprise.
